name: RelaxingSoundsSpaMusic
0:
”Alexa, Open Spa Music”
”Alexa, Ask Spa Music”
”Alexa, Start Spa Music”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spa music
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Spa Music helps you create an ambiance of relaxation and meditation regardless of the location or time! It relaxes your body and mind to reduce stress and make you feel better!

This Beautiful Relaxing and Healing Spa Music is the perfect musical accompaniment for relaxation, Meditation, Yoga, Deep Sleeping, and Stress Relief. This music will create a calming, peaceful, relaxing atmosphere to soothe your body and mind.

Reduce stress and anxiety and find some instant calm. Soothe your busy mind with this gentle stress-relief music.

PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP:
+ Premium audio quality
+ Longer sound loop
+ Unlimited hours of music

ROUTINE:
You can make an Alexa routine to activate Spa Music when you need to relax. To do this, launch the Alexa app on your phone or tablet and follow the instructions:

1. Tap the hamburger icon in the upper left corner
2. Tap Routines
3. Tap the + icon in the upper right corner to open up a New Routine tab
4. Tap “When this happens” to choose the trigger. For example, you can select Voice and then type “Spa Time”
5. Tap “Add action” and select “Skills”
6. Tap Your skills and find the “Spa Music” skill in the list
7. Tap “Save” in the upper right corner to create your new routine!

When you're ready to relax, say, “Alexa, Spa Time”

MORE INFO
How do you play spa music on Alexa?
Say, Alexa, Play Spa Music
 
Why is spa music so relaxing?
Our calm music creates an atmosphere of healing and soothing relaxation to allow you to unwind while you sleep or to meditate and relax to ambient music at home or your spa. Our calm and relaxing sleep music can be used as background sounds, meditation music, relaxation music, peaceful music, and sleep sounds. Let the soothing sounds help you relax.

What is the best music to play at Spa?
Music makes a big difference in the spa environment and can have a positive effect on people. Our calming Spa Music helps reduce levels of anxiety, and stress and restores the balance between the mind and body. You can play Spa Music on your Amazon Echo device by saying Alexa, play Spa Music. 

Is there music that puts you to sleep?
Spa Music is perfect for helping you with deep sleep, meditation, and relaxation. It is the best sound for stress relief. Our sleep music will also ensure you rest deeply and wake up refreshed. 

SUPPORT/ FEEDBACK
Your reviews and feedback are important to us! We'd love to hear from you! You can email us at hello@voicegames.ai.

This music is solely designed for personal development, learning, and relaxation or to support motivation. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. There are no medical claims intended. Call your doctor to receive medical advice.
